walk. To walk in God's light demonstrates a spiritual approach to life, righteous living, and a godly attitude. Jesus Christ is the way in which we should walk (John 14:6; 2 Ne. 10:23).

light of the Lord. Here the light of the Lord is set in the context of the temple. Walking in the light of the Lord has incalculable personal value because the light "enlighteneth [the] eyes" (D&C 88:11), "quickeneth…understandings" (D&C 88:11), infuses "joy into [the] soul," and dispels darkness so that the "dark veil of unbelief [is] cast away" (Alma 19:6).
